projects.name: Online Portfolio
projects.short: A small step to digitize the journey of work and life
projects.description:
A digitized version of my experience and journey 
 .The complete project is made using html/css and python Flask framework.
.A lot of Jinja2 templating is used for the data formatting and representation to the rendered html files.The html/css were not build form scratch ,a download template was used for the same.Find the project in github (link above)
